field.label: Cash On Delivery Payment Methods
field.comment: Selected payment methods will be treated as CoD methods when booking a shipment label.

field.label: Cash on Delivery Reason for Payment
field.comment: The money transfer purpose for cash on delivery payments can include the following placeholders: {{entity_id}}, {{increment_id}}, {{firstname}}, {{lastname}}. They will be replaced by the respective order's values.

field.label: Order Cut-off Time
field.comment: All orders that are placed after the configured time are assumed to be handed over to the respective carrier on the next business day. All orders that are placed before that time are expected to be handed over to the respective carrier on the same day. Value is interpreted as in the timezone configured for the current website

field.label: Packages
field.comment: Use this to create your own types of packages with your specific titles, sizes and tare weights.

field.label: Export Content Type
field.comment: Mail item category for international, non EU shipments.

field.label: Export Content Explanation
field.comment: The content description is mandatory if export content type is OTHER.

field.label: Enable Automatic Label Retrieval
field.button_label: Create shipments and retrieve labels via cron job.

field.label: Retry Failed Shipments
field.comment: Processing of shipments with Label Status: Failed will automatically be retried.
field.tooltip: If automatic retry is disabled, then all previously failed labels must be requested manually after revision of the shipment data. If enabled, label requests are repeatedly sent to the web service â€“ even when shipment data was not yet corrected. This may seem more convenient but failing label requests can pile up drastically, increasing load for the automatic processing in general.

field.label: Email Copy of Shipment
field.comment: A confirmation email will be sent to the customer when the shipment was successfully created.
